name: Camouflage
description: You target a creature within a very short (5 unit) distance, making them difficult to spot while in natural environments for the next hour. Being affected by this spell allows a character to attempt to take the hide action despite being in line of sight. Additionally, stealth checks gain a bonus dice and the creature's stealth check cannot be lower than a 4.
charge: You can affect up to 4 other creatures with this spell.
